Description:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather and understand integration requirements.
Design, develop, and implement APIs and middleware for system integration.
Create and maintain data mapping and transformation processes.
Troubleshoot and resolve interface-related issues to ensure uninterrupted data flow.
Ensure security and compliance standards are met during integration.
Monitor and optimize interface performance for efficiency.
Stay updated on industry best practices and emerging technologies in interface engineering.
Provide technical support and guidance to team members and end-users.Skills
Skills:
Masters or Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering.
PMI or PMP certified.
Minimum of 10 years of experience.
Must have worked minimum 5 years in GES+ company.
Must have approval from ARAMCO as an Interface Manager in Oil&Gas pipeline construction.
Age limit maximum 45 years.
